page.title: 10LAURIESTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Laurieston School is a two teacher school,serving the village of Laurieston and its rural neighbourhood The present school roll is 24.The curriculum is suited to all stages of primary education from Primary 1 to Primary 7 and has, as a main core, studies in number,mathematical relationships,spoken and written expression,reading and environmental studies,also art and craft,music and physical education.Swimming instruction and orienteering are introduced at the senior stages. School meals are prepared on the premises for all children who wish them.At present all the children take school meals.Regular visits are made to the school by the school dentist,the school doctor and the school nurse.School starts at 9am and finishes at 3-30pm.
